body: How is this a chapter 3? This isn't even the same story.... I was briefly really excited too. :(
Story overall was a bit retarded for my taste, the art was ok though; nipples was freaky but ok
to much long nipples. i still prefer Shinjugai's and Kazuhiro's Body modifications much more clean and are clearly experience in drawing  the female body.
This was great, Im kind of hoping for a sequel.
